com.robopupu.api.binding

Class TextViewBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robopupu.api.binding.ViewBinding<android.widget.TextView>
      • com.robopupu.api.binding.TextViewBinding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.text.NoCopySpan, android.text.TextWatcher, android.view.View.OnClickListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Binding

    public class TextViewBinding
extends ViewBinding<android.widget.TextView>
implements android.text.TextWatcher
